snippet: The Internet company, focused more intently on offering higher-quality entertainment, plans to announce a flurry of Sundance-related activities.
abstract: Yahoo, focused more intently on offering higher-quality entertainment, plans to announce a flurry of activities related to the Sundance Film Festival.
lead_paragraph: The Internet company, focused more intently on offering higher-quality entertainment, plans to announce a flurry of Sundance-related activities.

headline.seo: Yahoo Seeks to Rebrand Itself at Sundance
headline.main: Yahoo Seeks to Freshen Its Brand at Sundance
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Seeks to Freshen Its Brand at Sundance
